text: The 1900–01 Bucknell Bison men's basketball team represented Bucknell University in intercollegiate basketball during the 1900–01 season. The team finished the season with a 12–1 record and were retroactively named national champions by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Bucknell Bison men's basketball seasons Bucknell Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Bucknell Bison Men's Basketball Team Bucknell Bison Men's Basketball Team
title: 1900–01 Bucknell Bison men's basketball team
